author: cerminar
body:
This is the backport of #22590.

The following features have been added:
1. PCL workflow for PCC correction computation on dedicated ALCARAW
2. Prompt workflow for consumption of the corrections computed by PCL and creation of a new ALCARECO
3. RelVal tests for all of the above (modified existing workflow 1020).
4. ConfigDP scenario to run 1 and 2 @ Tier0
5. equip ConfigDP tests to check the new workflow creation
title: Integration of the new Lumi PCC workflow in PCL and Prompt-Reco: backport to 10.0
